name: FFFFFF (STARRIVER)
description:
– Controls –
Press space to flip gravity.
On mobile, tap and tap some more.

– What do? –
Dodge spikes. You can change direction in mid-air!

– Where come from? –
This is a tribute - in name and in spikes - to everyone's favourite spiky platformer.

The version on this page is a cleaned-up fork of our GGJ22 entry with WeirdosKlamber.
Check out his stuff, it's pretty clamberable.

If you'd like something a bit less spiky, we also made Feral Flowers.
